id.description: Unique identifier for the payment entry

order_id.description: Unique identifier for the associated order

customer_payment_method_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer's payment method

payment_method_id.description: Unique identifier for the payment method

is_approved.description: Flag indicating if the payment was approved

is_declined.description: Flag indicating if the payment was declined

card_type.description: Type of the card used for payment (e.g., VISA, Mastercard)

card_expiration_month.description: Expiration month of the card used for payment

card_expiration_year.description: Expiration year of the card used for payment

approved_at.description: Timestamp when the payment was approved

authorization_code.description: The authorization code obtained for the payment

reject_reason.description: Reason for payment rejection if applicable

avs_code.description: Address Verification System (AVS) code for payment validation

payment_method_name.description: Name of the payment method (e.g., Credit Card, PayPal)

amount.description: The total amount of the payment

payment_note.description: Additional note or description related to the payment

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the payment entry was last updated

created_at.description: Timestamp when the payment entry was created

gift_certificate_id.description: Unique identifier for a gift certificate used in the payment

is_captured.description: Flag indicating if the payment was captured

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the payment transaction

last_four.description: Last four digits of the card used for payment

is_void.description: Flag indicating if the payment was voided

gateway_response_code.description: Response code received from the payment gateway

cvv_response_code.description: Card Verification Value (CVV) response code for payment security

sent_to_spark_pay.description: Flag indicating if the payment details were sent to Spark Pay

token.description: Security token associated with the payment

payment_ref_num.description: Reference number associated with the payment transaction

store_payment_method_id.description: Unique identifier for the payment method stored by the store
